Health star ratings: Why researchers say it’s time to rethink them https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/health-star- ratings-why-researchers-say-its-time-to-rethink-them/FKW34MU6TZEN3LOHJZXDCSD6B4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/health-star- ratings-why-researchers-say-its-time-to-rethink-them/FKW34MU6TZEN3LOHJZXDCSD6B4/ Jamie MortonThere are fresh calls to overhaul star ratings shoppers use to help hunt out healthy food. Sun, 22 Sep 2024 06:00:00 +0000 While used by most shoppers, health star ratings have been criticised by nutritionists and consumer advocates for being sometimes misleading, self-regulated and covering only a third of the products they’re intended to.
Waikato Police Superintendent Bruce Bird gets temporary role after bullying ruling https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waikato-police-superintendent-bruce-bird-gets-temporary-role-after-bullying-ruling/NH3LKM5ZZVCBLIUCBABMS4T34A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waikato-police-superintendent-bruce-bird-gets-temporary-role-after-bullying-ruling/NH3LKM5ZZVCBLIUCBABMS4T34A/ Belinda FeekThe IPCA said Bruce Bird's management style was 'no longer acceptable' for the police. Sun, 22 Sep 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Waikato's top cop Bruce Bird will leave his role for nine months to work on a national project focusing on creating efficiencies.

Photo / Alyssa Smith

Weather: Active thunderstorms sweep North Island causing localised power outages; heavy rain and large hail reported https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-active-thunderstorms-sweep-north-island-causing-localized-power-outages-heavy-rain-and-large-hail-reported/GWI3BDBLK5CB5KD4MI4GX3TPAY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-active-thunderstorms-sweep-north-island-causing-localized-power-outages-heavy-rain-and-large-hail-reported/GWI3BDBLK5CB5KD4MI4GX3TPAY/ Benjamin PlummerFrom 12pm to 3pm, there had been about 6800 lightning strikes over the North Island. Sun, 22 Sep 2024 05:12:34 +0000 At 1.23pm, MetService issued a severe thunderstorm watch over Waitomo, Taumarunui, Taranaki, Taihape and Whanganui, warning heavy rain, hail, squally wind gusts and frequent lightning would follow. Photo / MetService

FPC rugby: Hawke’s Bay Tui pull a stunner out of the hat, beating Auckland at Eden Park https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-tui-pull-a-stunner-out-of-the-hat-beating-auckland-at-eden-park/ MLTVGDAGHNAIDBA2XFGUF67ZTE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-tui-pull-a-stunner-out-of-the-hat-beating-auckland-at-eden-park/ MLTVGDAGHNAIDBA2XFGUF67ZTE/ Doug LaingHawke's Bay needed something uplifting and it came in New Zealand's biggest stadium.
